original_text: But if those who are unclean do not purify themselves, they must be cut off from the community, because they have defiled the sanctuary of the Lord. The water of cleansing has not been sprinkled on them, and they are unclean.
korean_text: 사람이 부정하고도 자신을 정결하게 하지 아니하면 여호와의 성소를 더럽힘이니 그러므로 회중 가운데에서 끊어질 것이니라 그는 정결하게 하는 물로 뿌림을 받지 아니하였은즉 부정하니라

sentences.original_text: But if those who are unclean
they must be cut off from the community
because they have defiled the sanctuary of the Lord
The water of cleansing has not been sprinkled on them
sentences.korean_translation: 정결케 하는 물이 그들에게 뿌려지지 않았으므로
